name: Last Time Trying Experience
description:
An Interactive Digital Music Experience by Lawrence Nieves

An Interactive Experience created to showcase the potential of digital music experiences set to Moon Kissed's song Last Time Trying. What other ways can we be surrounded by the music we love if we can't go to concerts? Why stick to album art and music videos when the tools are out there to make fully immersive worlds? 

We are coming into the cusp of the experience age where expression is limitless. This project was created by one developer over the course of 3 days using entirely free digital tools. Anyone has the ability to create their own digital music experiences today. To read more on this subject you can read this project's brief here.

Make sure to check out Moon Kissed on Instagramand stream their album!
